item.description:
Another great opportunity for fellow bloggers in the Greater Boston area to network.

It will be good to talk about our blogging activities for this past year as well as what can be on tap for next year, such as attending the 2007 BlogHer in Chicago and New York.

If anyone has a blog that has gone national-tell us about it!


Regarding this meetup:

-Who should come?
Everyone-it would be great to see those who participated in the past and catch up with you.

-Are newcomers welcome?
Absolutely. New bloggers or curious about bloggers as well.

-Why should people come?
Everyday we read what everyone is writing about and we get one side of the story. This is an opportunity to get to know the people behind what you're reading and to share ideas and tips.

-What will it be like?
Fun and informative.

-Should members bring anything?
Good humour, and good cheer for now. I'll let you know if you should bring something else. :)

group.name: The Greater Boston Area Weblogger Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Weblogger August Meetup
